testcase.name: The example
testcase.system-out: Given an example scenario...................................................passed When all step definitions are implemented...................................passed And additional steps are added..............................................passed But unnecessary steps are removed...........................................passed Then the scenario passes....................................................passed

testcase.name: Addition
testcase.system-out: Given I have entered the numbers 5 and 7 into the calculator................passed When I press the add button.................................................passed Then the result should be 12 on the screen..................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Strong Password
testcase.system-out: Given a user with password "Strong@123".....................................passed Then the password should be strong..........................................passed

testcase.name: Sign Up with Valid User Information
testcase.system-out: Given a user visits the sign-up page........................................passed When the user enters the following user information:........................passed And the user clicks the sign-up button......................................passed Then the user should be registered successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Sign Up with Invalid User Information
testcase.system-out: Given a user visits the sign-up page........................................passed When the user enters the following user information:........................passed And the user clicks the sign-up button......................................passed Then the user should see an error message...................................passed
